workflows.name: Google AI Studio - Browserless Automation (Basic)
workflows.description: Базовая автоматизация Google AI Studio через Browserless и Puppeteer

workflows.name: Google AI Studio - Browserless Automation (Advanced)
workflows.description: Продвинутая автоматизация с валидацией, историей и расширенными настройками

workflows.name: Google Gemini - Production Ready
workflows.description: Прямые API вызовы к Google Gemini без прокси

documentation.title: Google AI Studio Automation - Full Documentation

basic_usage.curl: curl -X POST https://jejopeguki.beget.app/webhook/ai-studio-automation -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"prompt": "Расскажи о квантовых компьютерах"}'
basic_usage.python:
import requests

url = 'https://jejopeguki.beget.app/webhook/ai-studio-automation'
payload = {'prompt': 'Расскажи о квантовых компьютерах'}
response = requests.post(url, json=payload)
print(response.json())

advanced_usage.curl: curl -X POST https://jejopeguki.beget.app/webhook/ai-studio-advanced -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"prompt": "Создай план статьи о нейросетях", "model": "gemini-2.0-flash-exp", "temperature": 0.7, "maxTokens": 4096}'
advanced_usage.python:
import requests

url = 'https://jejopeguki.beget.app/webhook/ai-studio-advanced'
payload = {
  'prompt': 'Создай план статьи о нейросетях',
  'model': 'gemini-2.0-flash-exp',
  'temperature': 0.7,
  'maxTokens': 4096,
  'saveHistory': True
}
response = requests.post(url, json=payload)
data = response.json()
if data.get('success'):
  print(f"Response: {data['response']}")
  print(f"Request ID: {data['request_id']}")
